Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition:
Congested \Con*gest"ed\, a. 1. (Bot.) Crowded together. --Gray. [1913 Webster]
2. (Med.) Containing an unnatural accumulation of blood; hyper[ae]mic; -- said of any part of the body. [1913 Webster]
congested adj : overfull as with blood [syn: {engorged}]
